paragraph: To call or text the contact number for a consultation

detailsData.title: Experienced Legal Team
detailsData.content: Our team has handled highly complex cases in federal and state courts, representing both domestic and international concerns.

detailsData.title: Commitment to Clients
detailsData.content: We value each relationship and work hard to ensure the best possible outcome while providing a positive experience throughout the entire process.

detailsData.title: Reputation for Success
detailsData.content: Our goal is to win justice for our clients, which has fueled our reputation for success in handling various legal matters.

address: 601 South Figueroa Street, Suite 2050, Los Angeles, CA 90017
valueProp: At Nelson & Fraenkel, we understand the importance of selecting the right legal representation. Our commitment to our clients is paramount, as we value each relationship and strive for the best possible outcome.
CTA: SPEAK WITH A LAWYER NOW, AVAILABLE 24/7

testimonalData.text: Nelson & Fraenkel rocks! I couldn’t be more pleased with the compassion they all showed to me and also, the settlement I received. I will always call on them when I am ever in need of rockstar representation!
testimonalData.author: A Very Grateful Client

testimonalData.text: I have been a client of Nelson & Fraenkel for years, and they have always provided exceptional legal services. Their dedication to their clients is unmatched.
testimonalData.author: Satisfied Client

testimonalData.text: The team at Nelson & Fraenkel is top-notch. They handled my case with professionalism and care, ensuring I received the justice I deserved. Highly recommend!
testimonalData.author: Happy Client
